tool_description: Validates geological survey data for completeness, consistency, and accuracy across multiple data types and sources.

dataset_ids.description: List of dataset identifiers to validate

reference_standards.description: Reference standards or protocols to validate against

error_messages: Dataset not found: One or more dataset IDs not accessible.
Invalid validation level: Use one of [basic, standard, comprehensive].
Invalid tolerance: Tolerance must be between 0 and 10 percent.
Insufficient data: Dataset too small for meaningful validation.
Format inconsistency: Data format inconsistent across datasets.
usage: Provide dataset IDs, validation level, data types, and quality parameters to perform comprehensive data validation.
